overview: Ola is India's largest ride-hailing and mobility platform offering cabs, autos, bikes, rental and outstation rides, as well as electric vehicles and corporate travel solutions.

faq.a: Ola provides on-demand transportation through cabs, autos, bikes, rental packages, and outstation rides. Users can book rides via the Ola app in hundreds of cities across India.

faq.q: What types of rides do you have?
faq.a: Ola offers categories like Micro, Mini, Prime Sedan, Prime SUV, Auto, Moto, Rentals for hourly packages, and Outstation for intercity travel.
Pricing varies based on city, category, distance and time. The app always shows transparent upfront fares before booking.
Yes, Ola Electric offers S1 series scooters. Ola also deploys EVs for cabs in certain cities.

How to become an Ola driver?
faq.a: Drivers can join Ola Fleet by registering on the app or visiting a partner center with license, RC, Aadhaar and insurance.
